name: Altair: Battlegrounds
description:
Hello everyone!

This game was inspired by Hearthstone and Slay The Spire mostly.

You will have to beat the other players, earn gold, buy potions to make fights last longer and.. again from the beginning of the sentence.

As this game is only in Alfa version, the new content will be added in future to make fights more interesting and game mechanics more complex.

Subscribe, leave feedback, get involved in making game better, chat with other players.

Basic gameplay features:

  • 4 classes - Druid, Mage, Warrior and Assassin
  • Each class has 3 statuses in battle
  • After change of status, the deck is refreshed and new cards, related to status, are added
  • Once deck to draw from become empty, it's refreshed
  • You can buy potions before battle only
  • You can use as many potions in battle as you want
  • 100% evasion is possible, so be careful
  • Please note that online counter in Account page is refreshed every 30 seconds

Welcome to Altair!
